name: Retro Drift (itch)
description:
Controls:

Gas/Brake = Up And Down Arrows

Turning = Left And Right Arrows

Restart Race = R

Exit Race = Escape

Tips:

It's best if you release the gas and start turning a little before the turn, then re-apply the gas to get through the corner. Also go slow down the slopes (they're pretty steep sometimes and you might flip over if you're going too fast).
